text: Seven Nannies () is a 1962 Soviet comedy movie directed by Rolan Bykov.Ушла из жизни старейшая актриса РАМТаСЕМЬ НЯНЕК It stars Semyon Morozov, Valentin Burov, and Vladimir Ivashov. ==Actors== *Semyon Morozov — Afanasy Polosukhin *Valentin Burov — Pavel *Vladimir Ivashov — Victor *Mikaela Drozdovskaya — Maya *Tatyana Nadezhdina — Lena *Natalia Batyreva — Ira == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1962 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Rolan Bykov
title: Seven Nannies
